pullRequest.title: SDL-0289 Support for Set Language Separately
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #1313
This PR is ready for review.
Risk
This PR makes minor API changes.
Testing Plan

 I have tested this PR against Core and verified behavior (if applicable, if not applicable, explain why below).

Summary
A new SdlManagerListener method would need to be added, and the old one should be deprecated.
CLA

 I have signed the CLA

commit.message: hmiDisplayLanguage and vr/tts language set separately

nodes.bodyText: This does not properly describe the parameter, it just copies the above.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -62,8 +62,9 @@
 	 * is not supported.
 	 *
 	 * @param language The language of the connected head unit the manager is trying to update the configuration.
+	 * @param hmiLanguage The hmiLanguage of the connected head unit the manager is trying to update the configuration.

nodes.bodyText: This was not agreed upon, please revert.
This was not agreed upon, please revert.
Per the proposal, The old method has to be deprecated.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -62,8 +62,9 @@
 	 * is not supported.
 	 *
 	 * @param language The language of the connected head unit the manager is trying to update the configuration.
+	 * @param hmiLanguage The hmiLanguage of the connected head unit the manager is trying to update the configuration.
 	 * @return An object of LifecycleConfigurationUpdate if the head unit language is supported,
 	 * otherwise null to indicate that the language is not supported.
 	 */
-	LifecycleConfigurationUpdate managerShouldUpdateLifecycle(Language language);
+	LifecycleConfigurationUpdate managerShouldUpdateLifecycle(Language language, Language hmiLanguage);

nodes.bodyText: if Developers are still using the old managerShouldUpdateLifecycle method, that needs to be taken into account and still needs to work.
Same thing here with using old managerShouldUpdateLifeCycle method

Add spaces after commas here, like
(appName, null, TTSChunkFactory.createSimpleTTSChunks(ttsName), null);

Add space before curly brace.
managerShouldUpdateLifecycle(Language language, Language hmiLanguage) {

Just to keep up with good formatting to keep all code consistent could you please add a space before the curly brace?
managerShouldUpdateLifecycle(Language language) {
Same thing here if they are using the old method
Since you cannot set language separately from hmiLanguage at this point, we should leave it as hmiLanguage
Delete line of unnecessary white space here
Delete line of unnecessary whitespace here
